Text: Do not waste your time folks. This is not the new remastered version due out soon. This is a very grainy upscaled version that also contains an HDNet logo overlayed in the corner for the duration of the entire movie.

@ Shotobuke

Wow, so the "HDTV" in the name wasn't a hint for you that this has been capped from TV?
